release.action: Added JSON to the list of supported formats. This one relies on the updated intenz-export dependency.
Added explicit dependency on intenz-xml in order to extract the XML schemas and make them also available from the web service.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-core, intenz-ffwriter and intez-export (which fixes issue with rogue log file in the server).
Updated to latest versions of intenz-mapper and intenz-ffwriter.
Updated index page to the new EBI website guidelines.
Added dependency on biobabel-webapp to include EBI web templates from web service.
Added IUBMB flags to IntEnzXML and BioPAX responses.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-core, intenz-mapper, intenz-export - which implement IUBMB flags -, intenz-ffwriter and rhea-biopax.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-export, which fixes issue with IntEnzXML validation in LDCs.

release.description: Reactions as CMLReact in XML responses
release.action: Updated to latest versions of intenz-mapper, intenz-export - which now exports Rhea reactions as CMLReact - and intenz-ffwriter.
